explanation: Gathering all necessary ingredients and tools ensures that the cooking process is smooth and uninterrupted.
title: Preparation

explanation: Cooking the pasta to the right texture is crucial for the overall dish quality.
title: Cook Pasta
expected_outcome_description: Pasta is cooked to al dente texture.
Pasta is drained and set aside, with some pasta water reserved.
Pasta is not overcooked or mushy.

explanation: Cooking the pancetta or bacon adds flavor and texture to the dish.
title: Cook Meat
expected_outcome_description: Pancetta or bacon is crispy and golden brown.
Excess fat is rendered and can be used for flavoring.
Meat is not burnt or undercooked.

explanation: Creating a creamy sauce without cream is a key characteristic of Carbonara.
title: Make Sauce
expected_outcome_description: Eggs and cheese are combined into a smooth mixture.
The sauce is creamy and coats the pasta evenly.
The sauce is not scrambled or lumpy.
